column4: Got a little question here, I can't make more than 1 app play music with alsa (without esd). Can anybody help me?
that's exactly what esd is for....
I know, but it should be possible with alsa as well, and if i run esd it can't run ut with sound. (I like my own music on the background).
bob2 and konrad gave you the answer to that :)
